activities: Basecamp is a privately held company that offers web-based project management applications and software. When a user registers for any Basecamp product, we ask for information such as name, company name, email address, billing address, credit card information. Members who sign up for the free web account are not required to enter a credit card.  Basecamp uses collected information for the following general purposes: products and services provision, billing, identification and authentication, services improvement, contact, and research. Basecamp does not share personal information with third parties, unless explicitly approved by the user.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: all client and customer personal data, manually processed and electronic
